title: Finally, a video game where you can customize the size of your dong
text:
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter + 
Avatar customization in video games has come a long way. You can make your hero as muscular or as scrawny as you like. Style them with a hairdo from any decade. And even upload a picture of your face. 
However, I can’ t help but feel like something’s been missing. A personal touch that games have never been able to capture. But what? What can developers allow you to customize to even further bridge the gap between game and reality ? 
Dong size. It’s dong size. 
Luckily, Conan Exiles is here to fill that hole. 
Chris Livingston of PC Gamer got his hands on an early access demo of the upcoming open world survival game, as well as its fully fleshed out penis customization feature and hyper realistic dong physics. 
And Livingston spent his time doing what any self-respecting games critic would do: moving the dick slider back and forth repeatedly. NSFW but Conan Exiles has an endowment slider. Big dong, little dong, big dong, little dong pic.twitter.com/MNgGsmlv32 
— Chris Livingston (@screencuisine) January 30, 2017 
He also took full advantage of the game’s “vanity camera”, examining Conan’s bouncing, swaying cock and balls from every angle. NSFW, more cock & balls from Conan Exile. I hope this is earning me XP pic.twitter.com/159udrkgIp 
— Chris Livingston (@screencuisine) January 30, 2017 
Can’t find a weapon? No problem. warning, NSFW because of Conan Exile's cock & balls gif ok pic.twitter.com/H41VsIHy4j 
— Chris Livingston (@screencuisine) January 30, 2017 
And you thought it was humiliating getting tea-bagged in Halo . 
Eventually, he did manage to find some clothes. Thank gosh was finally able to craft some clothing so i'm not completely naked (note: nsfw still cock & bawlz) pic.twitter.com/c7YFiGnyax 
— Chris Livingston (@screencuisine) January 30, 2017 
Wow. And we thought Virtual Reality was a game changer. The future is now, people. What a time.
